class,dea.function,tests.LND7Function
dea.chromosomelength,50
dea.maxallelevalue,100.0
dea.minallelevalue,-100.0
dea.movesigma,10.0
dea.numiters,10000
dea.sendrecvperiod,1
rndgen,1,1
dea.numthreads,1
class,dea.randomchromosomemaker,popt4jlib.EA.DblArray1CMaker
class,dea.movemaker,popt4jlib.EA.DblArray1MoveMaker
class,dea.localoptimizer,popt4jlib.GradientDescent.FletcherConjugateGradientST
fcg.maxiters,1000
fcg.maxbracketingiters,1000
fcg.maxsectioningiters,1000
fcg.gtol,1.e-5
fcg.redrate,5.0
